title: Gridfinity: The modular, open-source grid storage system
author: nateb2022
aiHeadline: Gridfinity: The revolutionary modular storage system that promises to organize your life in a grid-like fashion, because clearly your life isn't already a mess.

title: The new skill in AI is not prompting, it's context engineering
author: robotswantdata
aiHeadline: The new skill in AI? Context engineering, because clearly we've mastered prompting and now need to figure out how to make AI understand the difference between 'I'm hungry' and 'I'm starving for knowledge.'

title: There are no new ideas in AI only new datasets
author: bilsbie
aiHeadline: There are no new ideas in AI, just new datasets—because apparently, the solution to all our problems is just more data, not actual creativity.

title: Xfinity using WiFi signals in your house to detect motion
author: bearsyankees
aiHeadline: Xfinity is now using your Wi-Fi signals to detect motion, because your Wi-Fi router has been spying on you all along, and now it's just being honest about it.

title: Show HN: TokenDagger – A tokenizer faster than OpenAI's Tiktoken
author: matthewolfe
aiHeadline: TokenDagger: The tokenizer that's faster than OpenAI's Tiktoken, because speed is the new black, and your CPU fan spinning like a jet engine is just a minor inconvenience.
